titleStmt.title: A particular and full account of several great matters relating to Ireland of the burning and destroying several places by the popish army; as it was delivered from Colonel Walker, governour of Londonderry, and others his friends which came with him from Ireland, to their friends at Chester, August 24. 1689. With an account of Col. Walkers reception and entertainment.
titleStmt.author: T. W.

titleStmt.title: A particular and full account of several great matters relating to Ireland of the burning and destroying several places by the popish army; as it was delivered from Colonel Walker, governour of Londonderry, and others his friends which came with him from Ireland, to their friends at Chester, August 24. 1689. With an account of Col. Walkers reception and entertainment.
